name: Nuway
author: Nuway

sections.description:
Nuway’s chatbot provides instant support 24/7, without the need for human agents to be available around the clock. This can reduce the number of agents in your CRM department.

Please Note: This plugin relies on a 3rd party service provided by Nuway. By using this plugin, you acknowledge and agree to Nuway’s terms of use and privacy policies.

To use this plugin, you must register on Nuway’s website and enter your CompanyID on the plugin page.

For more information, please visit:
– Nuway Website
– Nuway Terms of Use
– Nuway Privacy Policy
– Contact Nuway

License

This plugin is licensed under the GNU General Public License v2 or later. See License URI for more details.
sections.installation:
To install the plugin, follow these steps:

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/nuway directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Click on the “Nuway” link on the left-side menu to configure the plugin.
  4. Enter your CompanyID from the page in the Nuway dashboard panel (https://app.nuway.co/#/business/setting/chatbot).
  5. Save the settings, then you can see the Nuway widget on your webpages.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Tested up to WordPress 6.4.
  • Updated plugin to comply with latest WordPress guidelines.

1.0

  • First release of plugin
